name: Scrap
description: SCRAP is the utility token for the Solana NFT Project, "Taiyo Robotics." The token is essential for robot upgrades, breeding/incubation, Taiyo P2P games, and much more. SCRAP is a deflationary token with a total supply of 5.00MM. SCRAP can only be generated via staking of a Taiyo Robotics NFT. If you are looking to buy or sell SCRAP, Raydium, is the most active exchange
